title: Nouveau Eyewear Launches All-New Website
text:
By CLICK Staff  10 AM 
CARROLLTON, TX—Nouveau Eyewear has launched the new NouveauEyewear.com . The state-of-the-art website is the easiest and most powerful platform to view and order Rx-able eyewear and sunwear, the company stated. “We had one goal—to make the best website possible,” said Dominick Sblendorio, Nouveau Eyewear president and CEO. “The new site has exceeded our expectations. It has never been easier to discover Nouveau Eyewear’s innovative style and quality.” 
NouveauEyewear.com offers a wide array of features for eyecare professionals: Online Ordering —Registered accounts can sign in to NouveauEyewear.com and order product directly online. Accounts can also order point-of-purchase materials. Live Inventory —No backorders. Period. NouveauEyewear.com updates inventory several times a week. Only in-stock items can be ordered online ensuring that each order is 100 percent fulfilled. New Releases —Preview Nouveau’s newest models right from the homepage in the New Releases section. Newest models are also marked on every collection page. Frames Data Accuracy —All product images, measurements and pricing are pulled directly from the Frames Data database ensuring 100 percent accurate information. Catalog On-Demand —Users can create custom PDF catalogs with only the frames they want. Users can add entire collections or individual frames to create an individual catalog. Favorites List —Users can build a list of frames they can access anytime. A great tracking tool, the Favorites List can be anything from frames currently carried to frames the practice plans to purchase in the future. 
A special series of tutorial videos on every new feature of the site is posted at www.TinyUrl.com/NouveauWebTutorials 
The new site was developed by Jobson Interactive . MORE ON: CLICK
